item.title: ADA Publishing Microservices
item.description: Babbage engine (the power-supply end). CC-BY-2.0 Jitze Couperus. Wikimedia About ADA Research Project (Advanced Document Architecture), Oct ‘18 — an interoperable framework The problem space ADA is addressing is research publication production. Research publishing is made up of two main workflow types: traditional ‘research paper’ workflows; and then ‘research artifacts’ workflows, which is made up of everything else produced in the research cycle.
